posts.post_content:
Hi All,

***This card has been sold***

I have this T206 Red Ames (hands at chest version) for sale - it has a Piedmont 150 series/factory 25 back. Recent sales in a PSA 1.5 grade have been around $70 and $88, so I would like to get $90 for this card.

Thanks,
Todd
I forgot to add that it would be $90 (net to me) delivered via PayPal F/F. Please send me a PM if interested.
Dropping price to $55 delivered before it goes to Ebay.
Hi Todd I'll take the Ames.
